A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite many disappointing flaws in characterizations and the narrative\, The Last Jedi is still a strong and explosive installment to the Star Wars universe—packed with risky and intriguing storylines\, powerful performances\, nostalgic scenes\, brilliant plot twists\, impressive action sequences and breathtaking visuals—and has a dazzling quality to outshine some of its predecessors and maintain the legacy.
